A short time ago, Russian long-range Smerch MLRS targeted the Peresadivka area of Mykolaiv Oblast, around 64 km from the nearest Russian-controlled territory. Explosions were heard in the area. A Russian reconnaissance drone was operating there at the time.

A short time ago, Russian long-range Smerch MLRS targeted the Peresadivka area of Mykolaiv Oblast, around 64 km from the nearest Russian-controlled territory. Explosions were heard in the area. A Russian reconnaissance drone was operating there at the time.
More Smerch MLRS have hit the same are just now.
Iskander on Sumy Oblast.
Iskander on Sumy Oblast.
Flying south of the city. 2 missiles.
Flying south of the city. 2 missiles.
Approaching the Lebedyn area, Sumy Oblast
Disappeared
Explosions were heard from Sumy City.
Another Iskander to Sumy Oblast, flying in the same direction.
4th Iskander to Sumy Oblast
5th Iskander to Sumy Oblast. All flew one after another towards Lebedyn.
The Iskanders seem to be impacting in this general area.
Zelensky has arrived in Washington ahead of his meeting with Trump.
Kryvyi Rih, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, is being attacked by Russian Geran-2 drones. ~19 drones are involved, and several impacts have been recorded.

Can you see this message?
edit: Some of my posts aren't going through, not sure why.
POV: Western MSM every single time Kryvyi Rih gets attacked.
Both Iskanders seem to have impacted in/near the village of Martove, Kharkiv Oblast.

Footage showing the two Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile strikes that targeted the village of Martove, Kharkiv Oblast, last night. They reportedly targeted a Ukrainian preparation site for launching long-range UAVs. 
Coordinates: 49.95638, 36.96833

Russian forces have captured the village of Poltavka, Hulyaipole direction, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~1,110.
Total land area: ~6.49 km¬≤.

Ukrainian UAVs are flying to Crimea for a large attack. Groups are flying towards Yevpatoriya on the western coast of Crimea, and Saki on the southern coast. More are flying in from off the coast of southern Kherson Oblast.

During the Ukrainian UAV attack on Crimea today, a Russian Su-30SM fighter involved in air defence operations crashed after it was hit by friendly fire. Russian VKS-affiliated channel Fighterbomber confirmed the reports, stating that the crew survived and is safe.

A short time ago, Russian long-range Smerch MLRS targeted the Peresadivka area of Mykolaiv Oblast, around 64 km from the nearest Russian-controlled territory. Explosions were heard in the area. A Russian reconnaissance drone was operating there at the time.

Ukrainian drones from the "Lasar" drone group of the National Guard hit and destroyed the Russian BM-30 Smerch launcher that targeted Peresadivka, Mykolaiv Oblast last night. 
A reconnaissance drone monitored the launches of Smerch rockets, before relaying the coordinates of its relocated position to drone crews who subsequently struck it. 
Coordinates: 46.325527, 32.735003 (~30 km from the frontline).
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 16, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 16, 2025 (Maps Update)

Russian Army Makes Gains In Donetsk, Dnepropetrovsk & Zaporozhye 
The Russian military made additional gains in the directions of Donetsk, Dnepropetrovsk and Zaprorozhye, according to reports from October 16.
In Donetsk, the Tsentr [Center] Group of Forces expanded its control in the Dobropillia salient, to the northeast of the city of Pokrvosk, capturing territory to the east of Dorozhne. Russian troops solidified their control over the small settlement in recent days after fierce battle with Kiev forces.
This advance will allow Russian troops to attack Ivanivka and Nove Shakhove, expanding the width of the salient westward.
üëâ

Trump Authorizes CIA Operations In Venezuela, ‚ÄòNight Stalkers‚Äô Spotted Near Country 
The New York Times reported on October 15 that the CIA has received authorization to carry out covert operations in Venezuela, with United States President Donald Trump confirming this later on the same day.
The report, which quoted U.S. officials, said that the Trump administration‚Äôs strategy is focused on removing President Nicolas Maduro from power.
‚ÄúI authorised for two reasons, really,‚Äù Trump said, answering a question on the report during a White House news conference.
‚ÄúNumber one, they [Venezuela] have emptied their prisons into the United States of America, and the other thing are drugs. We have a lot of drugs coming in from Venezuela, and a lot of the Venezuelan drugs come in through the sea, so you get to see that, but we‚Äôre going to stop them by land also,‚Äù he added.

Gas Infrastructure Under Fire From Russia: Why Ukraine Risks Facing Its Toughest Winter Yet
On the night of October 15-16, intensive mutual strikes between Ukraine and Russia continued. Russian forces concentrated on strategic gas extraction and compressor infrastructure in Ukraine's Kharkiv, Poltava, and other regions. This network of facilities forms a critical circuit, supplying up to 35% of the eastern region's domestic gas, and the attacks led to a cascading deterioration in pressure and an overload of compressor lines.
The Ukrainian Air Force reported a large number of ballistic missiles launched by Russia‚Äî37 missiles in a single raid, of which only 5 were successfully intercepted. The low interception efficacy is attributed to the modernization of Russian missile systems like the "Iskander" and "Kinzhal," which have been upgraded to abruptly change trajectory in the final flight stage, as well as the fact that the targeted regions‚ÄîKharkiv and Poltava regions...

ISRAEL SEEKS RE-ESCALATION

Critical Situation: Ukrainian Armed Forces Transfer Reserves To Pokrovsk
The Ukrainian command is urgently redeploying a special purpose brigade to the Pokrovsk area. A battalion that lost combat capability near Vovchansk is being disbanded by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. 
In Brussels, timelines were presented for the implementation of plans to utilize frozen Russian assets.

Northern Cyprus Leader Warns Of Growing Israeli Presence On Island After Air Defense Deployment 
President of Northern Cyprus Ersin Tatar has warned of growing Israeli influence in the south of the Island, saying that Tel Aviv and Athens do not want him to remain in office.
"Tel Aviv and Athens don't want to see me at the head of the country," Tatar said in an interview with state-run Anadolu Agency on October 15.
In September, tensions flared up on the island with the delivery of Israeli-made Barak MX integrated air defense systems to Southern Cyprus.

A Chess Game Between The Turks And Israel On A Syrian Chessboard
While the self-proclaimed "president" of Syria ponders the future "normalization" of diplomatic relations with ‚ÄúIsrael‚Äù, Zionism is preparing for a new phase of confrontation.
It's unclear how long the so-called truce between Hamas and Israel will last, but judging by the media reports from the occupation forces, the Zionists are preparing for new wars, with Syria at the epicenter. The fact is that Israel cannot exist without external aggression, and this isn't a matter of the ruling cabinet. The colonialists are committed to advancing the IMEC project, which entails combating the main components of the Silk Road. This explains why Egypt and Turkey are preparing for war, despite their close ties with ‚ÄúIsrael‚Äù.
As for Syria, Zionism insists on dividing the country to prevent the creation of the Hejaz Railway. Therefore, the south of Syria is destined to become a new arena of battle between colonialists...

Russian Army Advances Deeper In Kupyansk, Captures Two More Settlements In Kharkiv (Videos) 
On October 17, the Russian military advanced deeper into the city of Kupyansk and imposed control over two other settlements elsewhere in the Kharkiv direction.
The Zapad [West] Group of Forces has reportedly imposed control of all the areas to the north of Kuznechnaya street in the center of Kupyansk following fierce clashes with Kiev forces.
In addition to ongoing operations in Kupyansk, the Zapad Group of Forces continues to advance in the pocket to the east of the Oskil River, between the city and Kolisnykivka.
